title: 300A DC Bias Test System
subtitle: High current DC bias system with configurations from 50A to 600A

paragraphs: 5400/3265 300A DC bias system with 1mS ultra-fast measurement speed, basic accuracy up to 0.02%, AC parametric measurement up to 10MHz, providing 5Vrms/200mA powerful AAC signal drive, DC bias current up to 600A, support fast graphic scanning, equipped with a 7-inch WVGA touch screen, and through the USB, GPIB and LAN interface Programmable via USB, GPIB and LAN interfaces, it is an efficient and accurate test solution.

features.title: Ultra-Fast Measurement Speed
features.description: 1mS ultra-fast measurement speed for high-throughput testing environments

features.title: High Accuracy
features.description: Basic accuracy up to 0.02% ensuring precise and reliable measurements

features.title: Wide Frequency Range
features.description: AC parametric measurement up to 10MHz for comprehensive component characterization

features.title: Powerful Signal Drive
features.description: Provides 5Vrms/200mA powerful AC signal drive for testing various components

features.title: High DC Bias Current Capability
features.description: DC bias current up to 600A with multiple 3265B units, suitable for high-power inductor testing

features.title: Fast Graphic Scanning
features.description: Supports fast graphic scanning for detailed component analysis and visualization

features.title: Modern User Interface
features.description: Equipped with a 7-inch WVGA touch screen for intuitive operation and data visualization

features.title: Comprehensive Connectivity
features.description: Programmable via USB, GPIB and LAN interfaces for flexible integration into automated test systems

specifications.heading: Test Parameters
content: Capacitance (C), Inductance (L), Resistance (R), Conductance (G), Susceptance (B), Reactance (X)
Loss Factor (D), Quality Factor (Q), Impedance (Z), Admittance (Y), Phase Angle (θ)
